component_config.title: Cypher Search Interface
component_config.description: Advanced database query interface for power users

facility_overview.name: Facility Overview
facility_overview.description: Get overview of all facilities and their basic information
facility_overview.template: MATCH (f:Facility) RETURN f.facility_id, f.facility_name, f.location LIMIT 20

recent_incidents.name: Recent Incidents
recent_incidents.description: Find recent action requests and their status
recent_incidents.template: MATCH (ar:ActionRequest) WHERE ar.date >= date('2023-01-01') RETURN ar.action_request_number, ar.title, ar.date ORDER BY ar.date DESC LIMIT 20

equipment_analysis.name: Equipment Analysis
equipment_analysis.template: MATCH (ar:ActionRequest)<-[:IDENTIFIED_BY]-(p:Problem) WHERE toLower(p.description) CONTAINS 'equipment' RETURN ar.action_request_number, p.description LIMIT 15

facility_connections.name: Facility Connections
facility_connections.description: Show relationships between facilities and action requests
facility_connections.template: MATCH (f:Facility)<-[:BELONGS_TO]-(ar:ActionRequest) RETURN f.facility_name, count(ar) as incident_count ORDER BY incident_count DESC LIMIT 10
